hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #2 Deku Scrubs#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Pot 2

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

HC (Malon).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Bomb Bag#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Bomb Bag#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say Ganondorf knows where to find the instrument of his doom.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Red Potion Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path to #Morpha#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Volvagia#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.
